Workflow.Name: Training and Registration - A Training Session Date is updated
Workflow.Description: When a Training Session has their dates updated, it will call a child flow to update the dates on the trainer's placeholder event and of the attendee's placeholder event. If the session was deactivated as cancelled, it will deactivate each booking and cancel the placeholder invites.

LocalizedName.description: Training and Registration - A Training Session Date is updated

Description.description: When a Training Session has their dates updated, it will call a child flow to update the dates on the trainer's placeholder event and of the attendee's placeholder event. If the session was deactivated as cancelled, it will deactivate each booking and cancel the placeholder invites.
